tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
	response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	survey_id INT,
	event_id INT,
	feedback TEXT,
	review TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EventFeedback (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id UUID,
    participant_id UUID,
    feedback_rating INT,
    feedback_comments TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id UUID,
    question_id UUID,
    participant_id UUID,
    response TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE EventFeedback (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  response_date DATE,
  response_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE MonitorEvents (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  organizer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Reviews (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
  survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE Events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100),
  event_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  organizer VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Participants (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  participant_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  rating_value INT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  survey_id INT,
  participant_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
)
